summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 14%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (up 7 mbar) and cloud levels (up 481 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and cloud levels (up 171 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 481.3m lower than yesterday, 170.7m lower than past week, 103.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 397m to a maximum of 2140m, averaging 786.1m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 956.9m and 889.9m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel quite hot. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and breezy at times. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
